mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cs_emp VALUES( cs_emp_seq.nextval, 0, '고객관리', '사원', #{name}, #{nickname}, #{username}, #{password}, SYSDATE )
INSERT INTO cs_attendance_log VALUES( cs_attendance_log_seq.nextval, #{empId}, SYSDATE, NULL )
UPDATE cs_attendance_log SET time_out = SYSDATE WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM cs_emp ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT t1.*, rownum rm FROM (SELECT * FROM cs_attendance_log WHERE emp_id = #{empId} ORDER BY time_in DESC) t1 ) t2 WHERE t2.rm = 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT e.*, rownum rn FROM cs_emp e LEFT JOIN cs_attendance_log al ON e.id = al.emp_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT emp_id, COUNT(*) AS unanswered_qnas FROM cs_qna WHERE qna_reply IS NULL GROUP BY emp_id ) q ON e.id = q.emp_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT emp_id, COUNT(*) AS open_live_chats FROM cs_live_chat WHERE end_date IS NULL GROUP BY emp_id ) lc ON e.id = lc.emp_id WHERE al.time_out IS NULL AND al.time_in IS NOT NULL AND al.time_in > (SYSDATE-2) ORDER BY open_live_chats, unanswered_qnas, e.id ) t1 WHERE t1.rn=1
